full_text: Knitted hat for men in DROPS Daisy or DROPS Karisma. Piece is knitted bottom up with stocking stitch, rib and cables. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #cremecaramelhat DROPS design: Pattern da-049 Yarn group B SIZE : S/M - M/L – L/XL Head circumference: 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/60 cm YARN : DROPS DAISY from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group B) 100-100-100 g colour 13, Almond Or use: DROPS KARISMA from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group B) 100-100-150 g colour 91, Almond NEEDLES : DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 3.5 mm: Length: 40 cm. DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 3 mm: Length: 40 cm. DROPS DOUBLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 3.5 mm. DROPS CABLE NEEDLE. The technique MAGIC LOOP can be used – you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size KNITTING TENSION : 22 stitches in width and 30 rows vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 3.5 mm = 10 x 10 cm. REMEMBER: Remember that needle size is only a suggestion. If you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized needles or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized needles.
name: Ravelry: 260-25 Creme Caramel Hat pattern by DROPS design
